import React from 'react' import {Navbar, Nav, Container, NavDropdown} from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { logout }from '../reduxState/actions/userActions' function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userData } = userLogin const dispatch = useDispatch() const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout) } return (
Django Ecommerce
Cart { userData ? ( Profile Logout ) : ( Login )}
) } export default Header
